messages.title: VOTE FOR Hazel Thorpe
messages.content: On Thursday 7th May to build a stronger economy and fairer society here in Worthing West & Tarring.

messages.title: A Record of Action. For Tarring & Worthing
messages.content: Hazel Thorpe, instigator of the big energy switch.

messages.title: Hazel Thorpe: The choice to beat The Tories here
messages.content: The General Election here in Worthing West will be a close fight between hardworking local Lib Dem campaigner Hazel Thorpe and the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Local campaigner Cllr Hazel Thorpe thinks this is wrong and is about to submit a Freedom of Information question to Worthing Borough Council, asking for their policy on the use of bailiffs.
Following the persistence of local Cllr Hazel Thorpe and others, the kerbs and drains have been attended to and made good.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Risking dumbing down education for all
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cllr Hazel Thorpe finds that the reduction in University funding and the raised cap on the student loan are unfair.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Council Tax frozen EXCEPT for those in need!
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrat candidate Hazel Thorpe and Lib Dem leader Keith Sunderland proposed that the Council should not impose this additional charge.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The General Election here in Worthing West will be a close fight between...Hazel Thorpe and the Conservatives. More and more Labour supporters are switching to back local Lib Dem Hazel Thorpe - the only candidate that can beat the Conservatives. The same is true in Tarring.

issues.education: Cllr Hazel Thorpe finds that the reduction in University funding and the raised cap on the student loan are unfair.
issues.governance: Local campaigner Cllr Hazel Thorpe thinks this is wrong and is about to submit a Freedom of Information question to Worthing Borough Council, asking for their policy on the use of bailiffs.
issues.socialWelfare: Council Tax was frozen for all but those people who qualify for housing benefit (excluding pensioners) who will now have to pay £5 more per week.

housing.content: Council Tax was frozen for all but those people who qualify for housing benefit (excluding pensioners) who will now have to pay £5 more per week.

politicalExperience.achievements: Instigator of the big energy switch, persuaded Worthing Borough Council to run an energy auction. Worked on local issues such as attending to kerbs and drains in disrepair.

images.caption: Hazel Thorpe, instigator of the big energy switch.
Hazel Thorpe, Liberal Democrat candidate for Tarring & Worthing West.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes Hazel Thorpe's local work, energy initiatives, and positions on education and council tax, while also presenting her as the tactical choice against the Conservative candidate in the upcoming election.
